00027 #ifndef MESQUITE_TOPOLOGY_INFO_HPP
00028 #define MESQUITE_TOPOLOGY_INFO_HPP
00029

00031 #include "Sample.hpp"

00034 namespace MESQUITE_NS

00036 
00037 class MsqError;
00038 
00040 class MESQUITE_EXPORT TopologyInfo
00041 {
00042   public:
00043   
00044     static const char* name( EntityTopology topo )
00045       { return topo > MIXED ? 0 : instance.longNames[topo]; }
00046     static const char* short_name( EntityTopology topo )
00047       { return topo > MIXED ? 0 : instance.shortNames[topo]; }
00048     
00050     static unsigned dimension( EntityTopology topo )
00051       { return topo >= MIXED ? 0: instance.dimMap[topo]; }
00052     
00058     static unsigned adjacent( EntityTopology topo, unsigned dimension )
00059       { return (topo >= MIXED) ? 0 : instance.adjMap[topo][dimension]; }
00060     
00068     static unsigned sides( EntityTopology topo )
00069       { return (topo >= MIXED || instance.dimMap[topo] < 1) ? 0 : 
00070           instance.adjMap[topo][instance.dimMap[topo]-1]; }
00071     
00078     static unsigned corners( EntityTopology topo )
00079       { return adjacent(topo, 0); }
00080     
00082     static unsigned edges( EntityTopology topo )
00083       { return adjacent(topo, 1); }
00084       
00086     static unsigned faces( EntityTopology topo )
00087       { return adjacent(topo, 2 ); }
00088       
00096     static void higher_order( EntityTopology topo, unsigned num_nodes,
00097                               bool& midedge, bool& midface, bool& midvol,
00098                               MsqError &err );
00099       
00133     static int higher_order( EntityTopology topo, unsigned num_nodes, MsqError &err );
00134     
00150     static int higher_order_from_side( EntityTopology topo,
00151                                        unsigned num_nodes,
00152                                        unsigned side_dimension,
00153                                        unsigned side_number,
00154                                        MsqError& err );
00155     
00157     static void side_from_higher_order( EntityTopology topo,
00158                                         unsigned num_nodes,
00159                                         unsigned node_number,
00160                                         unsigned& side_dim_out,
00161                                         unsigned& side_num_out,
00162                                         MsqError& err );
00163 
00165     static inline
00166     Sample sample_from_node( EntityTopology topo,
00167                              unsigned num_nodes,
00168                              unsigned node_number,
00169                              MsqError& err )
00170     {
00171       unsigned dim, num;
00172       side_from_higher_order( topo, num_nodes, node_number, dim, num, err );
00173       return Sample(dim, num);
00174     }
00176     static inline
00177     int node_from_sample( EntityTopology topo, 
00178                           unsigned num_nodes,
00179                           Sample sample,
00180                           MsqError& err )
00181     {
00182       return higher_order_from_side( topo, num_nodes, sample.dimension,
00183                                      sample.number, err );
00184     }
00191     static const unsigned* edge_vertices( EntityTopology topo,
00192                                           unsigned edge_number,
00193                                           MsqError& err );
00194     static const unsigned* edge_vertices( EntityTopology topo,
00195                                           unsigned edge_number );
00196     
00204     static const unsigned* face_vertices( EntityTopology topo,
00205                                           unsigned face_number,
00206                                           unsigned& num_vertices_out,
00207                                           MsqError& err );
00208     static const unsigned* face_vertices( EntityTopology topo,
00209                                           unsigned face_number,
00210                                           unsigned& num_vertices_out );
00211 
00224     static const unsigned* side_vertices( EntityTopology topo,
00225                                           unsigned side_dimension,

00230                                           unsigned side_dimension, 
00231                                           unsigned side_number,
00232                                           unsigned& num_verts_out );

00310                                               unsigned& num_idx_out );

00354                            const unsigned* side_vertices,
00355                            unsigned num_vertices,
00356                            unsigned& dimension_out,
00357                            unsigned& number_out,
00358                            bool& reversed_out,
00359                            MsqError& err );
00360 
00379     static bool compare_sides( const size_t* element_1_vertices,
00380                                EntityTopology element_1_topology,
00381                                unsigned element_1_side_number,
00382                                const size_t* element_2_vertices,
00383                                EntityTopology element_2_topology,
00384                                unsigned element_2_side_number,
00385                                unsigned side_dimension,
00386                                MsqError& err );
00387 
00388   private:
00389  
00390     enum {
00391       MAX_CORNER = 8,
00392       MAX_EDGES = 12,
00393       MAX_FACES = 6,
00394       MAX_FACE_CONN = 5,
00395       MAX_VERT_ADJ = 4,
00396       FIRST_FACE = TRIANGLE,
00397       LAST_FACE = QUADRILATERAL,
00398       FIRST_VOL= TETRAHEDRON,
00399       LAST_VOL = PYRAMID
00400     };
00401     
00402     unsigned char dimMap[MIXED];    
00403     unsigned char adjMap[MIXED][4]; 
00405     unsigned edgeMap[LAST_VOL-FIRST_FACE+1][MAX_EDGES][2] ;
00407     unsigned faceMap[LAST_VOL-FIRST_VOL+1][MAX_FACES][MAX_FACE_CONN];
00409     unsigned vertAdjMap[LAST_VOL-FIRST_FACE+1][MAX_CORNER][MAX_VERT_ADJ+1];
00411     unsigned revVertAdjIdx[LAST_VOL-FIRST_FACE+1][MAX_CORNER][MAX_VERT_ADJ+1];
00412 
00413     const char* longNames[MIXED+1];
00414     const char* shortNames[MIXED+1];
00415 
00416     TopologyInfo();
00417     
00418     static TopologyInfo instance;
00419   
00420 };
